thread.section_title: Brilliance.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brilliance.com | www.brilliance.com
thread.title: Luke Hopton

author: Luke Hopton
title: Luke Hopton
text: The ring took about a month to ship. They also sold the diamond I had purchased and offered me a smaller diamond for the same price or a larger diamond for a higher price. I am not impressed with the hundreds of clearly fake 5 star reviews. I only noticed they were fake after I had ordered, which was not pleasant. The ring looks great but honestly I would not do business with them again.
